name: Sum squares of numbers in list that may contain more lists
description:
Write a function that sums squares of numbers in list that may contain more lists

Example: ```javascript var l = [1,2,3] SumSquares(l) == 14 var l = [[1,2],3] SumSquares(l) == 14 var l = [[[[[[[[[1]]]]]]]]] SumSquares(l) == 1 var l = [10,[[10],10],[10]] SumSquares(l) == 400 ``` Note: your solution must NOT modify the original list Another Kata involving nested lists here (it's still in beta - more honor points for completing :D): https://www.codewars.com/kata/5786f020e55533ebb7000153
